price: Nokorε sε, wͻyε m’atamfo, gyesε Abͻdeε nyinaa Wura Nyankopͻn no,
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum ʿaduwwun lī illā rabba al-ʿālamīna
